channel.title: (PLEASE HELP ME!) Blitzbot and annoying people ( PLEASE HELP ME!)
channel.description:
1.) Blitz-Bot:Recently I've been getting.. spammed, null-ed, and "blitzed". I tried to hack the person back with the same program "blitz-bot" but it said it was rejected. They did not have my I.P blocked, I did not use the name "SYIpkpker" the other person hacked me with "SYIpkpker" and I have that named blocked in the list on names to not-allow to connect.
2.) Dial-Up: I have a hacker on my server who uses dial-up "PPP". So every time he restarts his computer he can easily get a new I.P, he has been trying constantly for TWO MONTHS! chasing away player's EVEN BANNING PLAYERS and he has no admin powers/etc. He log's in with diffrent account names, I just want to get rid of him.
Please guys, I beg of thee and the mopar lords to bring mercy to my server lmfao :(

item.title: (PLEASE HELP ME!) Blitzbot and annoying people ( PLEASE HELP ME!)
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

public static int MaxConnections = 1000;

Its in your server.java file.

Read full topic
item.source: (PLEASE HELP ME!) Blitzbot and annoying people ( PLEASE HELP ME!)

item.title: (PLEASE HELP ME!) Blitzbot and annoying people ( PLEASE HELP ME!)
item.dc:creator: @Natey Natey
item.description:
@Natey wrote:

[quote="(Anthony), post:7, topic:337814"][quote author=Natey link=topic=434215.msg3188478#msg3188478 date=1271996781]

[quote author=superpersonxd link=topic=434215.msg3188462#msg3188462 date=1271994890]

Go into player.java and find maxConnections = number;

change what’s after the “=” sign, change it to 1 or 2, that means only 1 or 2 connections, or people, per IP address, since Blitz-Bot uses the hosts IP, they can only have 2 bots online

I could not find that in player.java

btw source is Reapage Scape 2
[/quote]Then try client.java and look for maxPlayers or maxClients or maxConnections

I found all of those except maxClients, and the “max” stuff I did find was not relevant to what you were talking about
[/quote]was there something like maxConnections = 10000; or maxPlayer = 10000; ?

If he changed that then only 2 people would be able to connect.[/quote]nope, I’ve done it on my delta and more than 2 connected.

Read full topic
item.source: (PLEASE HELP ME!) Blitzbot and annoying people ( PLEASE HELP ME!)

Go into player.java and find maxConnections = number;

change what’s after the “=” sign, change it to 1 or 2, that means only 1 or 2 connections, or people, per IP address, since Blitz-Bot uses the hosts IP, they can only have 2 bots online

I could not find that in player.java

btw source is Reapage Scape 2
[/quote]Then try client.java and look for maxPlayers or maxClients or maxConnections

I found all of those except maxClients, and the “max” stuff I did find was not relevant to what you were talking about

[/quote]was there something like maxConnections = 10000; or maxPlayer = 10000; ?

If he changed that then only 2 people would be able to connect.[/quote]
SO WHAT SHOULD I DO
